Subjects: didactic verse; Benedict of Nursia, saint, feast of
_description: How to find Easter from St Benet’s Day — four monorhyming lines

CamTCC323.Transcription:
Ate feste of seint benedistÞenne is þe dai euene wid
                    þe nistNim þenne mone of foirtennistÞe necste sunedai
                    þer hestes paske rist
